item.title: AI tools for software engineers: 5 things to be careful about/aware of
item.description: AI tools for software engineers: 5 things to be careful about/aware of Hello there! 2023 is about to end soon, so it’s a good time to sit and reflect on it. If we think about the tech industry, in general, it’s easy to define which topic was the hottest this year - AI. And the chances are that in 2024, this area will grow even bigger alongside the growing investments and the new astonishing scientific discoveries in this field.
